How do I flip a model upside down?

I'm building a part which merges several existing Squad models. I've figured out how to combine multiple models, but am stuck. The code below places an aerodynamic nose cone on top and bottom of the part. It works fine except the bottom nose cone needs to be flipped upside down.

 

   MODEL
    {
        model = Squad/Parts/Aero/aerodynamicNoseCone/model
        position = 0, 0.2, 0
        scale = 0.175, 0.175, 0.175
    }


    MODEL
    {
        model = Squad/Parts/Aero/aerodynamicNoseCone/model
        position = 0, -0.2, 0
        scale = 0.175, 0.175, 0.175
    }
rotate = or rotation = I believe. Rotating X or Z by 180 will flip it. It may also be possible to scale Y negatively (-0.175) but I don't know what you'd get from that.
